channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Building LaTeX projects on Windows easily with Docker
item.description: In this post I describe how I build LaTeX projects on a Windows machine by using Docker and the blang/latex image Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/building-latex-projects-on-windows-easily-with-docker/

item.title: Using the YamlDotNet source generator for Native AOT
item.description: In this post I show how you can use the YamlDotNet source generator to do strongly-typed serialization and deserialization, even in Native AOT apps Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/using-the-yamldotnet-source-generator-for-native-aot/
